alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Martin, southeastern Greene and western Lawrence Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 14 miles south of Bloomfield to near Shoals to 10 miles northeast of Jasper. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shoals. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
